Category:Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II voice actors

nodes.text: Jacob Witkin (May 12, 1938 – December 31, 2016) was a South African actor who portrayed Morgan Katarn in the cutscenes of Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II, and he provided the voice for the character in the sequel, Jedi Outcast. Morgan Katarn's appearances in the subsequent games are based on Witkin's looks.
